subject: Free HDTV With No Monthly Fee!
body:
The email contains an 
advertisement.
For subscription changes, see the bottom of this 
message.
 
Dear AITech customer:
 
How about watching HDTV on your 
Notebook and Desktop computer without a monthly fee from your satellite or cable 
HDTV providers?
 
Better yet, you don’t even need to 
buy an expensive HDTV set! 
 
Just plug in AITech HDTV USB and the 
HDTV antenna and you are ready to enjoy dazzling High-Definition TV programming. 
It works up to the true HD 1080i resolution. The included software allows you to 
record the HDTV programming on your PC and to watch it any time you like. This 
is truly a device that can turn your laptop into a walking media center.  
 
   
 
PC magazine (December 5, 2006 issue) 
has an extensive article on how to get HDTV on your computer. It uses the 
internal HDTV tuner card on a PCI bus. Our product is even better. No messy 
internal installation which requires you to unplug everything and open up your 
PC, AITech HDTV USB plugs right into the USB port for ultra easy installations. 

 
Celebrating our 
20th anniversary this year, AITech has 
been the world leader in PC multimedia accessories and applications for over 19 
years. We are an USA company 
based in Silicon Valley, 
California. Our products are well 
respected and our support is right here in the USA, too. We are 
offering the Buy Direct and Save discount by clicking this link www.aitechusa.com.
 
 
Start enjoying 1080i HDTV on your PC 
with this simple and effective product from AITech. This is a great gift item 
for the Tech person who “has everything” already. He or she will be pleasantly 
surprised with this great ultra-portable device. 
 
 
 
 
In addition to your option 
of buying from AITech online 
e-store, you can also purchase our 
products at 
 
    
 
 
 
Best 
Regards,
 
Isabelle 
Wu
Internet Sales 
Manager
AITech International 
Corporation
a Silicon-Valley 
Company in U.S.A 
408-991-9699 ext. 
504
isabelle@aitechusa.com
www.aitechusa.com
 
This is an advertisement sent by a contract-marketing 
company.
If you are not interested in receiving future
